channel.title: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?
channel.description:
I have recently put in a thread, requesting an official RSC server in the staff section, been talking to mods and they like the idea, also communicating with some admins to see what we can come up with, awaiting MITB's reply.
Moparscape has an official Minecraft server, and soon to have an official RS2 server, now we need an RSC one.
This is the last way to get a huge playerbase happening again, and it done right it could potentially become the biggest RSC private server ever due to the community behind moparscape. Of course it would be an RSC-like server, very low rates. it would be that server worth waiting for.
would you play it?

item.title: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I think the way to handle the dev team, rather than trying to hand pick devs, would be to put the code on github. That way anyone can view it, along with all the commits, and anyone can submit a pull request so that everyone can contribute.

edit:
Also then I can easily just checkout a specific commit, compile, and run it to update the server anytime.

Read full topic
item.source: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?

item.title: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:61, topic:392501”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=489671.msg3581109#msg3581109 date=1303795649]
MITB want’s it compatible with Moparscape 4
[/quote]
what does this mean exactly?[/quote]

The client needs to be able to run in the Moparscape 4 Client. http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape4.php

Read full topic

item.title: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @GLeU GLeU
item.description:
@GLeU wrote:

if your going RSC replica completely. will you be finishing off ALL the quests also. and make the items have proper requirements so people will do the quests? as well as listen to people who know what the fuck there saying about RSC shit. if your keen about going the way whole ill support and help in whatever way i can, but i dont want no half ass’d bullshit that you give up on xEnt. shit has to be done right. so if that means 2months for this server to launch then so be it. make it as fucking close as possible or dont bother.

Read full topic

item.title: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @ilpuroil ilpuroil
item.description:
@ilpuroil wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:54, topic:392501”]well, lots of things need to be worked out.

MITB want’s it compatible with Moparscape 4

then we need to work out staff & devs, then f2p/p2p, exp rates, a beta to fork out bugs that have popped up since RSCA has stopped, and other things.

great things about this is, since RSCA is open source, everyone can view the code of the official server, therefore contribute, instead of not being allowed to show the code[/quote]

sounds great…have any ideas on who the staff will be?

Read full topic

well, lots of things need to be worked out.

MITB want’s it compatible with Moparscape 4

then we need to work out staff & devs, then f2p/p2p, exp rates, a beta to fork out bugs that have popped up since RSCA has stopped, and other things.

great things about this is, since RSCA is open source, everyone can view the code of the official server, therefore contribute, instead of not being allowed to show the code

item.title: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Since there are two threads going on and this is the more updated one I will post here.

xEnt requested the staff to consider the opportunity for the classic community to really take off and revive. As we see they have a minecraft server, a soon to be official rs2 server so why not a rsc server?

As for the people saying comments related to the amount of players the server will receive. If the server becomes “official” it means its going to be highly supported by the community of mopar. You think a newsletter to 300k+ registered users won’t do anything? I am not saying they will be willing to do a newsletter but I am just stating that look at how much power and access mopar has.

Of course the server will be non profit. It is all for best intentions and that is how it should be. The community has had a bad past of people trying to rip off players, ddos, etc etc. I am sure if this goes through the correct team will be assembled to maintain the server.

I really just hope it goes through so that we can all enjoy rsc once again.

Read full topic
item.source: Thoughts on an Official Moparscape RSC Server?
